# ciscoise_guest_user_email (Data Source)

It performs update operation on GuestUser.

- This data source action allows the client to update a guest user email by ID.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "ciscoise_guest_user_email" "example" {
  provider  = ciscoise
  id        = "string"
  portal_id = "string"
  additional_data {

    name  = "string"
    value = "string"
  }

}
```
